name: @ohm-js/es-grammars
description: Ohm grammars for modern versions of ECMAScript/JavaScript (ES2015+).

scripts.build: for year in $(seq 2015 2022); do YEAR=$year npm run gen-grammar; done
scripts.gen-grammar: node scripts/generate-ecmascript-grammar.mjs --verbose --name ES$YEAR --overrides spec/es$YEAR/overrides.json spec/es$YEAR/spec.grammar > gen/es$YEAR.grammar.ohm

author: Patrick Dubroy <pdubroy@gmail.com>
